Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory266.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before anyone knows what just happened, Noctis is already on his way dashing toward the pad.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'How much longer do we need?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "C'mon, it ain't as easy as it seems!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With the time on the timer ticking away, Noctis goes through the map in his head again.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "We aren't going to make it. What are we gonna do?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That's fine. You just need to make sure you don't see any unauthorized person aboard.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's not every day that the Gray Raven Commandant screws up, and that's something we need to take advantage of and party it up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "...If that's what you're trying to do, why don't you walk the walk and stop the transport craft yourself?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Tsk... I really don't want to bother the guys from WGAA with something like this because they already have more than what they can deal with on the plate for the day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's about what happened in the office in the morning, I gather? Nikola was looking for someone to go and deliver the speech... and he picked you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Wow, I see you're getting smarter, Noctis.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But I wouldn't have had to be the clown at the speech had you been as sharp-witted back when Nikola picked me, Noctis.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Commander Nikola probably just found your smile relatively normal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What's that even supposed to mean, though...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a humph, No. 21 exits the channel.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'In for a penny, in for a pound, I guess.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The Gray Raven Commandant will be there, too. Considering how lucky the commandant must feel—I just can't wait to drag them all down with me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'So, all I need to do is to get the letter, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'If you could, yes, but if it turns out to be too challenging for you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera stops cold over the line, leaving a deafening silence on purpose.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'll have no choice but to assign this bad luck to someone else. Let's see, maybe one of my beloved team members will do...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Well... I guess we'll just avoid that particular channel when you're on-air, then.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's just try to focus on busting the Gray Raven Commandant for now. Happiness is greater when shared, yeah? I'm sure it's going to be quite an enjoyable scene.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Of course, of course... I'll give it my best shot.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: "Picking up his pace, Noctis' amble quickly breaks into a sprint."}
{3: 'Then, somewhere down the path...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hey, fancy seeing you here. Care if I join?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says the WGAA member who makes an unexpected appearance next to him and butts in uninvited.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The Investigation Headquarters sent me here to keep an eye on you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The air seems to sizzle when the two look each other in the eye.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Then, at exactly the same time, they both pick up their pace.'}
{3: 'Hopping over the barriers and wooden boxes and scaling up a building with a protruding frame before swinging off a hanging rail...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory348.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{3: 'They let nothing stand in their way.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory348.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory263.png'}
{3: 'The tight match goes on, with the two taking turns leading the race.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Dude! Just stay out of this already!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'No, you guys should stay out of it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis throws an empty box at Kamui—who nonchalantly blocks it out with an arm.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You didn't really think you could stop me with that, did y...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Clang!'}
{3: 'Kamui runs straight into the board hanging by a coffee shop.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Fancy a cup of coffee? Hahaha...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Despite the mishap, Kamui manages to catch up.'}
{3: 'Running right next to Noctis now, Kamui hurls an empty box at Noctis.'}
{3: 'Seeing his own trick being pulled on himself, Noctis, too, blocks it out with an arm as he dodges a festival board hanging from above.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Let me tell you something, Kamui. It's all about timing...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis stumbles across a piece of metal on the ground and takes a nosedive into the ground.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Buddy, I rock Mario Kart.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Why you little...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hilda', 3: 'You will stop rig...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Before Hilda even finishes her sentence, a gust of wind swooshes past her, leaving her staring in bewilderment at both Noctis and Kamui from behind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "C'mon. That's just what young people do, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "And I don't see what can possibly go wrong when they're just running. A day like this is all the more reason to be a little more active, no?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: '(Squeaking noises)'}
{3: 'Right when Hassen finishes his sentence, a gigantic metallic being swooshes past them with a splash of sparks—before it veers off around the corner.'}
{3: 'The engine of the metallic being blasts long and loud as it goes down the same path that Kamui and Noctis just took.'}

{3: 'Fixing his hat that has been blown crooked, Hassen casts a long glance—and sees the metallic being speed into the distance with its turbo as the girl sitting on top of it shouts at the top of her lungs.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami coming through! Out of the way!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The members of Gray Raven are clinging onto Power for dear life.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is that Kamui and Noctis?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Likely! Power, let's go!", 4: '1'}
